verbs.description: [V: surprise] [ARG1: the equal rights amendment] is back the equal rights amendment first introduced to congress in 1923 appears to have a new chance at becoming part of the constitution it only takes one additional state to ratify the amendment which guarantees gender equality on the federal level and all bets are on virginia united states equal rights advocates congress carolyn maloney virginia equal rights amendment kati hornung rep carolyn maloney era united states congress
